performSharabilityHeuristics(URI, AntProjectHelper) - Method in class org.netbeans.spi.java.project.classpath.ProjectClassPathModifierImplementation
Takes a classpath root and tries to figure the best way to reference that file for that particular project.
PreferredProjectPlatform - Class in org.netbeans.spi.java.project.support
Returns a preferred JavaPlatform for a new project.
ProjectClassPathExtender - Interface in org.netbeans.spi.java.project.classpath
Deprecated.
As a caller, use ProjectClassPathModifier instead. As an implementor, use ProjectClassPathModifier.extenderForModifier(org.netbeans.spi.java.project.classpath.ProjectClassPathModifierImplementation).
ProjectClassPathModifier - Class in org.netbeans.api.java.project.classpath
An API for project's classpaths modification.
ProjectClassPathModifierImplementation - Class in org.netbeans.spi.java.project.classpath
An SPI for project's classpaths modification.
ProjectClassPathModifierImplementation() - Constructor for class org.netbeans.spi.java.project.classpath.ProjectClassPathModifierImplementation
 
ProjectClassPathSupport - Class in org.netbeans.spi.java.project.classpath.support
ProjectClassPathSupport is a support class for creating classpath based on the list of ant properties.
ProjectModulesModifier - Interface in org.netbeans.spi.java.project.classpath
Allows to update the module declaration in projects which support JDK9.
ProjectPlatform - Class in org.netbeans.spi.java.project.support
A factory for transient JavaPlatform defined within a project.
provideModularClasspath(FileObject, String) - Method in interface org.netbeans.spi.java.project.classpath.ProjectModulesModifier
Translates the classpath type into a proper modular one, if necessary.
